name: Sister's Shroud
description: A pall that draped the sarcophagus of the First Sister.

abilities.name: Veiled
abilities.description: Upon falling below the health threshold, grants the wielder enormous amounts of evasion for a short while.
notes: Triggers upon taking damage from an enemy while below 50% health
Triggers on any damage, not just attacks
The buff is applied after the triggering damage instance
If triggered by an attack, that attack is not evaded
Each attack that misses the wielder reduces the evasion bonus by 75% of the current value
Stacks diminishingly with other evasion sources

abilities.name: Last Caress
abilities.description: Veiled cooldown is only reset if the wielder dies or kills an enemy hero.
notes: Although the cooldown elapses normally, it freezes upon reaching 0
Cannot be reset with cooldown resetting sources

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
